page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: THERE IS VERY LITTLE ORGANISED ENTERTAINMENT IN OUR AREA. THERE ARE BARN DANCES AND SOCIAL EVENINGS ORGANISED IN THE VILLAGE HALLS AT LONG SUTTON AN SOUTH WARNBOROUGH BY GROUPS SUCH AS THE SCHOOL ASSOCIATION AND THE WOMENS INSTITUTE. SOMETIMES THERE ARE DISCOS FOR YOUNGER PEOPLE BUT NOT VERY OFTEN. BINGO SESSIONS ARE HELD FOR OLDER PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE HALLS BUT NOT EVERY WEEK. THE TWO PUBLIC HOUSES IN OUR BLOCK ARE PROBABLY USED MORE FOR ENTERTAINMENT THAN ANY OTHER FACILITY. SOMETIMES THERE ARE JUMBLE SALES OR FETES AND THEY ARE ORGANISED TO RAISE MONEY FOR CHARITIY OR THE CHURCH OR THE SCHOOL. THE NEAREST THEATRE OR CINEMA IS ABOUT 12 MILES AWAY.
